CustomField.description: This field will calculate total secondary sales target value for Project vertical Users.
CustomField.formula: SECONDARY_SALES_CPVC__c + SECONDARY_SALES_UPVC__c + SECONDARY_SALES_SWR__c + SECONDARY_SALES_SILENT_SWR__c + SECONDARY_SALES_COLUMN__c + SECONDARY_SALES_V4__c + SECONDARY_SALES_NEW_PRODUCT__c
CustomField.label: Total Target Value Projects
